TopicTitle: Newb ... This is the BEST & COOLEST game ever!

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Just got into KSP a few weeks ago, and this is my first post on the KSP Forums. 

KSP is amazing! You have an unstoppable platform here! KSP has the spaceship & aircraft engineering element on lock down! KSP really has no limits, especially with more aircraft / spacecraft parts coming out in the future. Can anybody recommend some good tutorials for beginners? I can make it to and from the Mun, but that's really about my max at this point. 

I love this game! My wife even thinks it's cool.. (Could be a trap, potential non-nominal event?)

Cheers

If you're looking for tutorials, there are a few options. The two I can think of right off the top of my head are:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLYu7z3I8tdEkUeJRCh083UT-Lq5ZIKI75" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

[The Drawing Board](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28352-The-Drawing-Board-A-library-of-tutorials-and-other-useful-information)

"The only limit is your imagination, or how much RAM your computer has."
